response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our latest and most innovative product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Our product offers unparalleled value and efficiency, tailored specifically to meet your unique needs. Given its exceptional capabilities and market positioning, we are confident it will significantly enhance your operations and contribute to your growth.

Considering the immense value this product holds for you, we are extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value of $1,200,000, reflecting our commitment to fostering long-term partnerships with forward-thinking clients like yourself.

Please let us know if you are interested in discussing this opportunity further. We are more than happy to provide additional information, including product demonstrations, case studies, and testimonials from other satisfied customers.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
